website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for gift bags that you can customize and that are suitable for numerous occasions, you'll be impressed with the unique scratch-panel concept that these bags offer.
pros: Boast a patent-pending design with scratch panels for inscribing personalized messages, making them practical for almost any occasion
"Scratcher" styluses and tissue paper in a variety of bright colors included
cons: Only one size, so not the best choice for large gifts

customer_reviews.title: I will DEFINITELY be buying these again.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are so great! I needed a medium-ish sized bag and when I came across these I ordered them because they came with different colored tissue paper and I thought that was convenient and the scratch area on the front was a nice touch. When I got them they surpassed my expectations. Great bags, good quality. The tissue paper saved me tons of time and since I needed 7 bags for 7 people the different colored paper was perfect. But the scratch pad is so cool. Use the provided styluses to write names (white I did) draw pictures or do whatever. So cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy L

customer_reviews.title: Original, sturdy and FUN!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. Good quality and just fun. I love the scratch feature on the front of each bag and the rainbow colors. I used one for a kid’s birthday party today and he loved it. I also like how the pack came with colorful tissue paper for each bag. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kaley Brydon

customer_reviews.title: So cool, not to mention useful
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to package some gifts in a different way and I found these gift bags. It's very cool how you can personalize the bags on the "special panel". These come with tissue paper and 4 special sticks to "engrave" your message (only 4 sticks provided for 7 bags, so I guess you're supposed to re-use them.) UPDATE: I've bought these 3 times now. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Julie J.

customer_reviews.title: Gift giving made easy
customer_reviews.text: These bags are so much fun and clever! I wish I had found them before today. I usually have to pull out my Cricut to decorate gift bags. I had 6 co-workers retiring and needed to get personalized bags to give them gifts in. With these bags, I just simply scratched the message on the front that I wanted to say and placed the plastic back over so it wouldn’t scratch off. I didn’t even need tissue as a single sheet was provided for each one in a different color. They were a hit and so easy! I highly recommend and I’m getting another set to have on hand for other last minute gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: Kandee cakes

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a neat idea! I love that they include the little pencil things to do your creations on the bags and the bags are a nice medium size and include multiple colors of tissue paper also! It's a great value for the price and a super neat idea that you don't need to buy different gift bags for the holidays - you just write on the square what you want it to say for whatever time of year! And if you want to customize the bag even more, they're white so easy to color or write on the rest of the bag as well!
customer_reviews.author: T. Vrba

customer_reviews.title: Made Well in the USA
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! Clean and sturdy, they are medium sized gift bags with colorful tissue paper for each bag. The scratch off panel on the front is great. The black paint on the outside is thick and it's not a cheap piece. It scratched nicely and the colors under came through well. The bags come with wooden scratchers, I'm pretty sure they're different points so you can draw with them nicely. I love these bags and will be buying them again. MADE IN THE USA❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sutnavage

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to give your gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun way to give your gift - can also save having to buy a card! Great for kids too, they can print or draw a picture which makes it very individualistic. We would like to see the next size up in bags as another choice, this size is perfect for medium size gifts. We like the tissue that comes with it to complete the look!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Love the personal message.
customer_reviews.text: I love these gift bags. I originally bought them for my daughters 21st birthday. In between I’ve used them for Mother’s Day, birthdays, Father’s Day, Easy to use and they look great, with the personal message. I ordered more already. I also ordered the wine bags, needless to say it’s a hit. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: scorpiogirl

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: I was actually wanting gift bags but didn't realize these were so small, these r more like small treat bags for party favors. I guess it pays to read the description better. Altho being able to scratch a message on them is clever they just aren't big enough for what I was wanting.....sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Amy  51

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are not only well made and priced great but they are super cute! I'm not artistic whatsoever but i could draw on them all day. It included more "pens" than needed and tissue paper!! I can't imagine what someone with artistic skills could create!
customer_reviews.author: ADPBR

customer_reviews.title: Better than I was expecting!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Exactly what I was wanting! Highly customizable!!! Packaging was nicely thought-out. Sturdy bag with plenty of space to fill easily! Highly recommend! Received an email from the shop with a printable activity packet for kids, I thought was a lovely detail.
customer_reviews.author: Bbycks85

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and unique
customer_reviews.text: You will love these new unique gift bags. You will be able to use black area to put whatever greeting you want. You will receive wooden stylus to draw in black area!Plus you get several gift tissues with the set. Necklace is just my gift I added to show you sample. Really worth the money ~ helps you use your imagination to individualize for someone special.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Scratch and Write
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept. Love the color tissue paper. However the bag is kinda small and you only get one sheet of tissue paper per bag. Need two at the very least. Wish bag was bigger. However I love that I can write I the bag with my own personal message.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda I. Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Really Fun Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are really unique with the scratch off front! I gave out a few gifts in these bags and they all commented on the words I scratched into the black square. Nice to have extras with tissue for a last minute gift. And if I don't have a card, no problem, just scratch in the message you want.
customer_reviews.author: L Thomison

customer_reviews.title: A pair of rolled-up men's jeans will fit in the bag depending on how well it's rolled and packed!
customer_reviews.text: Posting pictures in response to a customer-question "Q:Will a pair of jeans rolled up or folded fit into one of these bags?"
customer_reviews.author: AU

customer_reviews.title: Great gift bag!
customer_reviews.text: Just love these cute little bags! Perfect for any occasion & I had no trouble writing on them! Nice size too, could fit a small baby doll, Barbie doll, small book & treats in this! Will purchase again, what a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Candygrl5

customer_reviews.title: Super Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of these bags! The scratch paper is such a great idea to personalize your gift bag! Super easy to draw or write on it and the colors are vivid! The tissue paper is an added bonus. Will absolutely purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Great gift bag!!
customer_reviews.text: It is so special to write your own personal greeting on the Bag..Great creative design!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags .White bags do show folds a lot more than ones you can buy in dollar stores but design on front where you can write message is so neat. Has everything you need for a present no tags needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! And also that it comes with colored tissue paper and multiple scratch off pencils. It’s nice to have these gift bags on hand for birthdays, etc. and it’s so fun & cute to write a personalized message on the front! Definitely will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Eek!
customer_reviews.text: OMGosh these are so cute! I drew on the front for my friend, and left it generic so she can add to it and pass it on! I'm all about reduce, reuse, recycle! A fantastic way to add that little something special for a specific person. SO much fun - I spent a week deciding what I would put on the front!
customer_reviews.author: V. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fun to  personalize
customer_reviews.text: I am complimented each time I use one of these bags. I love being able to personalize it. I’ll be purchasing more, I like having them on hand. My package did not come with a stylus to write on the bag so I use a knife. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: carrieb484

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Used these for sibbling gifts for our hockey team and it was cute to write each name on the front, just something a little different. Nice quality, sturdy. Good Value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Personalize each gift bag!
customer_reviews.text: These are super handy to have around. Great for boy or girl gifts. Personalize a message and save $ on not buying a card!!! My kids love packaging up their gifts with these bags and knowing their presents stand out.
customer_reviews.author: momblob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unique gift bags with their own beautiful card.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved these. The kids loved the novelty of the scratch off card. Everyone thought they were unique, attractive and practical, since they come with the gift card on them. Excellent gift bags.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: They are the cutest bags ever! I'm so happy I bought them, i got them for my mom's presents and my kids had so much fun drawing and writing on them and it look AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Julieta vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Loved!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these bags. I used them for Easter bags this year instead of baskets. With 6 kids, it was a very crafty and unique way to write their names on it. Will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Add a wow factor to your gift bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags were a huge hit. It has a plastic protected scratch off board on the front of each bag, where you can custom write a message which will display in multi rainbow colors when you scratch through with the wooden stylus included with your bags.
customer_reviews.author: fabriholic23

customer_reviews.title: Great for its price
customer_reviews.text: The bags are simple and white. The scratch paper is only on one side and can be relatively difficult to master when starting to write on the bag. The package will include basic colored paper that can be used for additional decoration. Was a great addition to my gifts that I made for my friends. Will definitely buy again for another future event.
customer_reviews.author: KangeL

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buck, you get many bags and tissue paper.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are neat. They're not just birthday bags. It's an any occasion bag. You can decorate the front how you would like. Whether it be for birthday or mother's day or even Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Personalize your gifts!
customer_reviews.text: The bags were sturdy, and the choice of tissue paper included for topping off the bag was a good variety of colors. Kit included 4 wooden styluses that featured different sizes for writing, printing, etc. on your message. I had more fun than a kid peeling off the plastic, and then choosing a stylus and writing on the special surface that featured various colors for multi-color writing! These are just great to have on hand for small gifting!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute!!! The bags are sturdy and the ability to customize them is awesome. The fact they come complete with the tissue paper and even the little tools to write on the special multi-coloured surface makes it even better. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: bert16

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors underneath! very fun!
customer_reviews.text: these are sooo fun!!! receiptients loved them and a couple i left blank so the receivers could doodle on the front themselves and use them as a gift to others. super easy to remove the black and great bright colors underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. Because they are plain and not a specific theme, you can use them for any occasion and decorate however you like. The scratch area to personalize makes the bag stick out as it so unique and colorful. I will definitely purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Jones

customer_reviews.title: Buy these and you’ll love them!
customer_reviews.text: These might be the cutest gift bags ever! The owners of the company took care in packaging and ensuring satisfaction with their product. Will 100% be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: bethanne weiss

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This was a great way to give a gift with a personal touch. I definitely would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bags!
customer_reviews.text: While the bags were slightly smaller then I was thinking they were absolutely perfect. They came with everything in the description. Very easy to use. I put a few books in my bag so very sturdy! Just amazing product overall. The creators/vender are very kind people as well!
customer_reviews.author: dysnick12

customer_reviews.title: Adorable gift bags
customer_reviews.text: These gift bags are so cute. I thought they had ladybugs on them or something like that but they have the cutest slate like etching pad with rainbow colors underneath the etching surface. Totally unique and cute. I 💕 these gift bags
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good with customizing message
customer_reviews.text: This is good if you have any gift that yoi can't wrap traditionally or if you don't have any time to wrap your gift. This is also perfect when customizing message for the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wrapping Simplified and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ease of this bag and how cool the rainbow colors were when you wrote on the front section. So fun, no card required and complete with tissue. It doesn't get easier than that!
customer_reviews.author: Liv Rich in the OC

customer_reviews.title: Unique Gift Bags
customer_reviews.text: These gift bags are adorable and can be used for any occasion. The fact that they come with a variety of tissue paper makes them easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Terry T

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these bags!!! They were so cute! Definitely exceeded my expectations! I will definitely buy these again and again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Queen

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great and quite unique. In fact, no card is needed since you can write your greetings/felicitations on the bag itself. The writing appears colorful. Will order more for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Joly

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me - no colorful tags at all
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get the whole scratch tag thing to work at all. Maybe give a hint on how it works? If it’s supposed to be directly onto it make it easier to come out but when I tried with the black scratch board where it already was - it didn’t work at all. Don’t waste your money imho
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bags
customer_reviews.text: I truly love the bags, perfect for my thank you gifts at work. The message on the outside came out fantastically, this is such a great idea.!
customer_reviews.author: M S

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for staff presents and I loved them. So fun to be able to personalize them and cake with tissue paper on top of that. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Andrus

customer_reviews.title: The bags are so verstile
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can customize the message as needed and we actually use the rest of the bag to sign messages for our retirees, used the bag as a farewell card.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Alberhasky

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea !!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are so adorable and fun to write on/ draw on. I will definitely be ordering again when I need more. Too bad they didn’t make little cards or anything with the same concept. I really love them!
customer_reviews.author: Nina T

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute to keep handy for gifts. Since you can write on them, they can be used for any celebration
customer_reviews.author: Christina Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, but a little small if you're wanting to add full sized coloring books. Nice for bubbles, candy, toys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: richeward

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind for Any occasion
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift bag for any occasion to celebrate any special moment that may come across. This bag is to be decorated as you may wanted to say or show. Even if two people are using this bag for the same event... no bag is the same as you get to design it to your own liking and creativity.
customer_reviews.author: rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Came just as described. Each with a tissue paper to go inside. Good size to fit lots of presents. The scratch off part was covered securely so that it doesn’t get scratched in transit! 10 out of 10!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool idea. Bag as described. Came quickly. Nice idea for something different
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very creative product. Something new and fun to use. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique stand out!!
customer_reviews.text: Bags are SO cute and can be customized for any occasion. Amazing value - bags, tissue paper, and writing sticks - for what you get! Seven gift bags alone at any stationary store would be 4 times the price at least and nowhere near as unique. Product came fast and with a follow up email from the seller to make sure all was well. Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Personal best
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected and as advertised. The personalization makes the plain white gift bag, well...personal 🙂.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: It came on time and it was just what I expected it to be. The package was very convenient

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I can't like these gift bags enough! Packaged well, easy to customize/use, and ADORABLE!! Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute idea. Great way to personalized a gift. These were a big hit at the baby shower I attended.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomesauce
customer_reviews.text: I used these for booze bags(give alcohol to strangers) and absolutely loved them. I reordered to do juice bags(like booze bags for kids) and can't wait to put them together. These are definitely worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute bags!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and I love that you can write the person's name or a message on the front of the bag.

customer_reviews.text: What a unique idea to write your personal note right on the bags. It was fun personalizing each bag.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and creative bag for any occasion

customer_reviews.title: Bags were Great
customer_reviews.text: This product was used for appreciation bags for employees in my office. They were so pretty and the employees loved them, they hadn't seen anything like that before, I told them I got them from Amazon, they all wanted to order. Will order again, I loved them.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest gift bags. Simple and exactly what I was looking for.

product_meta.title: Purple Ladybug 7 White Gift Bags with Tissue Paper & Scratch Paper Panel for Customization! Unique Bulk Gift Bags with Handles - Great as Small Gift Bags, Party Favor Bags, Kraft Paper Bags, and More!
feature_bullets: 7 White Gift Bags have a scratch paper panel with rainbow drop pattern under the black matte surface allows you to scratch a personalised message onto each of the small gift bags.
Sturdy paper bags with handles great for gift-giving, party favours, wedding gifts or stocking up so you're always ready with gift bags bulk!
Patent-pending, ultra-unique kraft paper bags will make your gift stand out from the rest - never worry about a lost gift tag or card when you've written your message right on the bag as scratch art!

7 White gift bags with handles for easy carrying also come with 4 stylus-style scratchers to scratch your message and 7 different colours of tissue paper -- with these bags on-hand, MAKE WRAPPING EASY!

These kraft bags with handles measure 13 cm deep x 20 cm wide x 24 cm bag height + 4" handle drop. The scratch paper comes covered in a protective film so it will not scratch until you are ready to use the bag.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,156 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
